item.description:
Reschedule meeting due to last weeks storm!!!!

First meeting for the new season!!!!!

Hearth'n Kettle Restaurant on Rt 18 in Weymouth.

Social hour 5:30-6:30p Come have a bite to eat and socialize with the members.
Meeting begins at 6:30pm

Guest Speaker
Betsy Lister of Lister Insurance will speak to us about motorcycle insurance and all the changes with insurance and the Registry. She is very active in the motorcycle community.

Please bring a copy of your insurance policy. (if you have dropped your coverage down for the winter, please bring a copy that shows what you have with full coverage.) She will look over your policy for you.

Also we will begin to discuss our upcoming season and ride schedule so come with your ride ideas and suggestions for the new season.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Rescheduled Monthly Meeting
